This class encapsulates all functionality to draw a map of the overall maze, the set of visible walls, the solution.

markAreaAsRoom(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class generation.Floorplan
Marks a given area as a room on the maze and positions up to five doors randomly.
Maze - Interface in generation
A Maze encapsulates all relevant information about a maze that can be explored in a game.
MazeApplication - Class in gui
This class is a wrapper class to startup the Maze game as a Java application This code is refactored code from Maze.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes.

MazeBuilder - Class in generation
This class has the responsibility to create a maze of given dimensions (width, height) together with a solution based on a distance matrix.
